      • getViewHolder

        public static ViewHolder getViewHolder(ViewHolder.Callback caller,
                                       android.view.View convertView,
                                       android.view.ViewGroup parent,
                                       int layoutId,
                                       int position)
        获取一个viewHolder
        参数:
        caller - Caller
        convertView - view
        parent - parent view
        layoutId - 布局资源id
        position - 索引
        返回:
        ViewHolder
